WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

would it be possible to have a filter in computerlist grid? So I can type some letters to just Show Computers which have those letters in their Name.

Regards
Norbert

Comments.Message: Sounds great. Looking forward to filtering. ;)
I have sent you the new release of WPP with this feature. Please send me back the coresponding translation so I can include it in the new release.

Hi,

a quick test seem to work fine. Thanks for this feature.

Regards
Norbert
Need to change the behavior of the filter. When in the TextBox and press 'Enter' key, the display should refresh.

There should maybe be a reset filter button. I now have to clear the filterbox and press "filter" for having "no filter".

Bye
Norbert
Added a button to clear the filter and show all computers.
